title: 07: S6E07 – "Hybrid Horrors" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from author Christopher Maxim, Ryan Peacock, Kyle Harrison, and Dan Weatherer, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about evil eateries, fearsome felines, villainous vehicles, and paranormal portents.  

                             
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
